availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lewis Huntington Ball (Madison County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Madison County native. Son of Christopher C. Ball and Emily C. Porter Ball. Resident in Madison County in 1850. Resident of Richmond, Kentucky, from 1861 to 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District 1, p. 204A
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Jasper County, Marion, p. 59B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, 8th Congressional District, Madison County, KY, June and July, 1863, p. 19 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on October 1, 2019).
Find A Grave, “Lewis Huntington Ball (1843-1914)” Memorial #9122625, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/9122625 (accessed on October 1, 2019).
KYR-0002-022-0114
_Missouri Death Records, 1910-1962, Lafayette County, Missouri, Certificate #39282, accessed through Missouri Digital Heritage, https://www.sos.mo.gov/mdh/, on October 1, 2019).
